input.sentences: this is a picture of a street .
this is a picture of a person .
this is a picture of snow .
this is a picture of footprints .
this is a picture of a cat .
output.sentences: If you look close you can see the snow on the street in the picture.
The person wanted her picture taken in the snow.
In this picture you can see the snow falling.
I took a picture of my footsteps in the snow.
My cat is glad to be inside where it is warm.
